memberdef.name: DCTSIZE
memberdef.initializer: 8 /* The basic DCT block is 8x8 samples */

memberdef.name: DCTSIZE2
memberdef.initializer: 64 /* DCTSIZE squared; # of elements in a block */

memberdef.name: MAX_COMPS_IN_SCAN
memberdef.initializer: 4 /* JPEG limit on # of components in one scan */

memberdef.name: C_MAX_BLOCKS_IN_MCU
memberdef.initializer: 10 /* compressor's limit on blocks per MCU */

memberdef.name: D_MAX_BLOCKS_IN_MCU
memberdef.initializer: 10 /* decompressor's limit on blocks per MCU */

memberdef.name: jpeg_common_fields
memberdef.initializer: struct jpeg_error_mgr * err; /* Error handler module */\ struct jpeg_memory_mgr * mem; /* Memory manager module */\ struct jpeg_progress_mgr * progress; /* Progress monitor, or NULL if none */\ boolean is_decompressor; /* so common code can tell which is which */\ int global_state /* for checking call sequence validity */

memberdef.name: JPOOL_PERMANENT
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* lasts until master record is destroyed */

memberdef.name: JPEG_SUSPENDED
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* Suspended due to lack of input data */

memberdef.name: JPEG_SCAN_COMPLETED
memberdef.initializer: 4 /* Completed last iMCU row of a scan */

memberdef.argsstring: (j_compress_ptr cinfo, int which_tbl, const unsigned int *basic_table, int scale_factor, boolean force_baseline)
memberdef.name: jpeg_add_quant_table

memberdef.argsstring: (j_compress_ptr cinfo, int marker, const JOCTET *dataptr, unsigned int datalen)
memberdef.name: jpeg_write_marker
